FuncDef: This command assigns an existing CPU protection policy to the associated service interface. For these interface types, the per-source rate limit is not applicable. The CPU protection policies are configured in theconfig>sys>security>cpu-protection>policycpu-protection-policy-idcontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an existing CPU protection policy. Values-1 to 255.

ExtraInfo: Default: cpu-protection 254 (for access interfaces)cpu-protection 255 (for network interfaces)no cpu-protection (for video interfaces)
